txt.en: '[placeholder], we must take this chance while we have it. The Orcs in Maurûsh are weakened and I ask that you go and attack before they can regain their strength.'
There is no twist in this mission.
Your mission is to travel to Maurûsh and attack the Orcs before they can regroup and regain their strength.
You have successfully weakened the Orcs in Maurûsh. Return with the scout to Ashâmi with this report.
'[placeholder], your task is to travel to Maurûsh and attack the Orcs before they can regain their strength.'
'I am glad to hear that the forces at Maurûsh remain weakened. Thank you, [placeholder].'
Complete Mission: A Moment of Hope
Your mission is to travel to Maurûsh and attack the Orcs before they can regain their strength.\n\nSpeak to Ashâmi to travel.
